data.text: @g_gosden Oh but Johnson's moved on from Covid and Partygate...

@g_gosden Email from school today says Covid cases increasing with 25 in 6th form alone. They no longer have a good supply of tests as the ordering system has changed. This is becoming v disruptive to education for this cohort, again.
